title: Manifest Destiny
description: Manifest Destiny— Humankind’s early reach for the  “The Jaren,” five young backland aliens enlist to do war with the humans. “Enemy Mine,” (the story that became the motion picture). “Savage Planet,” a teacher lifts an entire world, and himself out of the dark. “USE Force,” a young man enlists to search for himself and instead finds his destiny.
author: Barry B. Longyear
